title: Route simulation through SimulationCraft + Patreon integration rebuild

changes.change: Added new demo routes for S4 dungeons.
Reworked the entire Patreon integration. NOTE: please re-couple your Patreon account with your Keystone.guru account to reclaim your benefits.
Added an option to generate a SimulationCraft string so you can simulate your routes. Open any route and check the "Simulate" button in the top header and go from there.
Importing an MDT string with Awakened Obelisks (think Mechagon) no longer sometimes crashes the MDT importer (hotfixed).
Map element visuals now once again save properly between sessions.
